member.name: T:BookLibrary.Book
member.summary: Represents a book with a unique ISBN-13 number

member.name: P:BookLibrary.Book.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the book as a string

member.name: P:BookLibrary.Book.Author
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the Author of the book as a string

member.name: P:BookLibrary.Book.NumberOfPages
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of pages in the book as an integer

member.name: M:BookLibrary.Book.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a book with four parameters to set Title, Author, Number of Pages and the ISBN number
